p:
To analyze capture efficiency and combination of lures, a generalized linear mixed-effects model (glmm) fitted with a negative binomial was used. The theta value was calculated from a zero model. For models using glmm the package lme4
30 was used, while stats package was used for glm. Post hoc tests were done using package multcomp
31 and Tukeyâ€™s all-pairwise comparisons. All graphs were made using ggplot2
32 and all analysis were done using R (version 3.53.12
33 ).
